description: A spate of resignations follows details of harassment in the workplace in Russia's liberal media.
title: Russia¡¯s young liberals confronted by MeToo moment
title_page: Russia¡¯s young liberals confronted by MeToo moment - BBC News
maintext: What stands out here is the spontaneity. There is no hashtag or name. It seems to have started from a single tweet which reverberated with dozens of women and men, mostly very young and part of the hip, liberal Moscow circle. They wanted to publicly call out the people who, they felt, violated or harassed them.
